properties.entry: SELECT A.SALES_DATE , A.SALES , A.REFUND , A.TOTAL_SALES FROM DAILY_SALES A WHERE SALES_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yy/MM/dd') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yy/MM/dd') ORDER BY SALES_DATE
SELECT SUM(A.SALES) , SUM(A.REFUND) , SUM(A.TOTAL_SALES) FROM DAILY_SALES A WHERE SALES_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('?', 'yy/MM/dd') AND TO_DATE('?', 'yy/MM/dd')
